Package org.kawanfw.commons.api.server.util

Provides utility classes that may be used in Configurators.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpServletRequestStore
    Allows to retrieve the HttpServletRequest instance corresponding to the client request.
    ServerInfo
    Gets some server info, including info extracted from HttpServletRequest at server startup.
    Sha1
    SHA-1 hash functions on strings and files with default provider.
    SingleLineFormatter
    This Formatter is used by DefaultCommonsConfigurator.getLogger().
    Ssh
    This class provides static methods for SSH authentication to be used directly in CommonsConfigurator.login(String, char[]) implementations.
